short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension to set everything to dark mode. This gives a more visually pleasing experience to the eye.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple Chrome extension to set everything to dark mode. This can help reduce eye damage and overall give a more visually pleasing experience to the eye.
 
This Chrome extension is designed to automatically switch the current website to dark mode. Here’s a breakdown of what it does:

1.Apply dark mode: This extension will automatically change the site you are on to dark mode. This can reduce eye strain and can help reduce power consumption.
2.Invert colors: if the 1st step is unsuccessful, the extension will invert the site’s colors in such a way that it gives a similar effect.

This approach ensures that the website will either switch to dark mode or invert its colors to achieve a similar effect.
-Put together by Felix Abraham and Samuel Abraham
